title: WBSAMB Notification 2025 - Apply Offline for 23 Assistant Engineer, Sub Assistant Engineer Posts
description: The West Bengal State Agricultural Marketing Board (WBSAMB) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 23 Assistant Engineer, Sub Assistant Engineer Jobs. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed thier Diploma, B.E./B. Tech in Electrical, Civil Engineering can apply for the WBSAMB Notification 2025. The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we ...
